body_html:
@andrewharp Thank you very much for your reply.

The python application that I want to move to android is evaluate.py at https://github.com/lengstrom/fast-style-transfer.

evaluate.py will take a model file (checkpoint file) generated by the style.py and stylize an input image. Style.py will stay on desktop computer. I intend to move the evaluate.py to android.

I am new to both tensorflow and application development on android. I appreciate if you can provide some specifics how to modify the sample tensorflow on android demo to port the evaluate.py to android platform. Thanks.

body:
**@andrewharp**  Thank you very much for your reply.

The python application that I want to move to android is evaluate.py at https://github.com/lengstrom/fast-style-transfer. 

evaluate.py will take a model file (checkpoint file) generated by the style.py and stylize an input image.  Style.py will stay on desktop computer. I intend to move the evaluate.py to android.

I am new to both tensorflow and application development on android. I appreciate if you can provide some specifics how to modify the sample tensorflow on android demo to port the evaluate.py to android platform. Thanks.
